meta.name: system
meta.description: Dashboard for the telegraf input plug-in:
meta.author: influxdata

queries.query: SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") AS "usage" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."cpu" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: % CPU time

queries.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."disk" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: % used

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("read_bytes"), 1s) / 1000000 AS "read_megabytes_per_second" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."diskio" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: MB/s

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("write_bytes"), 1s) / 1000000 AS "write_megabytes_per_second" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."diskio" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("load1") AS "load" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."system" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("used") / 1073741824 AS "used", mean("available") / 1073741824 AS "available" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mem" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: GB

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_recv"), 1s) / 125000 as "rx_megabits_per_second" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."net" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: Mb/s

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_sent"), 1s) / 125000 as "tx_megabits_per_second" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."net" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("err_in"), 1s) / 125000 as "tx_errors_per_second" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."net" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("err_out"), 1s) / 125000 as "rx_errors_per_second" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."net" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("tcp_established") AS "tcp_established" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."netstat" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("udp_socket") AS "udp_socket" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."netstat" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("tcp_established")) AS "tcp_established" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."netstat" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("udp_socket")) AS "udp_socket" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."netstat" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("total") AS "total" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."processes" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT max("memory_rss") / 1000000 AS "max_mb_memory_rss" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."procstat" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
queries.label: MB

queries.query: SELECT max("cpu_usage") AS "cpu_usage" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."procstat" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
